text: Bwebajjirwa e kigambo e kyemirembe oba e kyentiisa bakiraalaasa, so singa bakizza eri omubaka oba abo abakwatibwako ensonga mu bo, bandikitegedde abo abalina obusobozi bwokusengejja amakulu gaayo, singa tebyali birungi Katonda byabawa nâ€™okusaasira kwe mwandigoberedde Sitane mpozzi abatono mu mmwe
